Package uk.ac.ebi.miriam.ws

Class Summary
DataBaseContext Context for a database connection (connection and statement) Part of the MIRIAM Web Services package (uk.ac.ebi.miriam.ws) Uses: the pooling services provided by DBCP, from the Apache Jackarta Project.
DataSourceManager Initializes DBCP environment by creating a pool for connections Part of the MIRIAM Web Services package (uk.ac.ebi.miriam.ws) Uses: the pooling services provided by DBCP, from the Apache Jackarta Project the singleton design pattern, in order to have only one pool This needs: the "DatabaseProperties" class (settings for the database connection) Copyright: EMBL-EBI, Computational Neurobiology Group
MiriamDatabaseProperties Database properties: constants and some usefull static methods Copyright: EMBL-EBI, Computational Neurobiology Group
MiriamProvider MIRIAM web services provider (server part) Part of the MIRIAM Web Services package (uk.ac.ebi.miriam.ws) Uses (with many thanks to these projects): logging, with Log4J connection pool, with DBCP And: Apache Tomcat Apache Axis Copyright: EMBL-EBI, Computational Neurobiology Group
